BH/Blastrage:



Blastrage, manning the 10X grenade launcher, and BH, driving the skimmer, let 
out yelps of surprise.

Where Koga Shuko's base had been, was charred rubble.  They had suspected 
something bad had happened when they noticed lots of glass in the sand.  
Signifying two things.  A huge window had been broken, or an explosion had 
occured, and the flames had turned the sand into glass.  The skimmer stopped 
to a halt.

"Slag it!  Our money!" BH yelled, hopping out of the skimmer.

"Somone killed them before we could get our energon?  We've got to find out 
who!"

"Yeah, I know Blastrage.  Then we can get OUR payment, one way, or another."

BH got back into the skimmer, starting up the engines and lifting a dozen 
feet into the air, heading east.
